original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND c.Score=2 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-19 12:45:55' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-03 21:46:37' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=1183 AND u.Views>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 2
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 1183 AND users.Views >= 0
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4.Id=E3.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-19 12:45:55' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 21:46:37'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4E3.Id=E2.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E3E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E4E3E2.Id)
